Package com.team1389.control

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MotionProfileController
    a controller that uses PID to follow motion profiles
    PIDController<O extends Value,I extends PIDTunableValue>
    This class applies PID control to a set of input/output streams
    Does all computation asynchronously, it updates without any prompting from the user
    PIDRangeIn<T extends PIDTunableValue>
    an adapter class from a PID tunable Ohm input stream to a WPILib PIDSource
    PIDRangeOut<T extends Value>
    an adapter from am Ohm output stream to a WPILib PIDOutput
    SmoothSetController
    generates trapezoidal motion profiles in real time to direct the controller towards the setpoint within a fixed set of kinematics constraints
    SynchronousPID
    This class implements a PID Control Loop.
    SynchronousPIDController<O extends Value,I extends PIDTunableValue>
    This class applies PID control to a set of input/output streams
    Does all computation synchronously (i.e.
